Elon Musk announced new Tesla features.

The Olympics will be in Los Angeles.

The World Cup final in Qatar.
Michael Jordan played for the Chicago Bulls.
Tom Brady retired from the NFL.
Usain Bolt ran in the Olympics.
Shohei Ohtani plays for the Dodgers.
Yesterday, John Smith from IBM met with Sarah Johnson at Google HQ in Mountain View.
The CEO of Tesla, Elon Musk, announced a new factory in Berlin, Germany.
Apple's Tim Cook and Microsoft's Satya Nadella attended the conference in Davos.
Dr. Anthony Fauci spoke about COVID-19 at the WHO meeting in Geneva.
Amazon founder Jeff Bezos purchased the Washington Post newspaper.
Facebook, now Meta, moved its headquarters from Menlo Park.
The New York Times reported on events in Washington D.C.
SpaceX launched a rocket from Cape Canaveral, Florida.
Toyota and Honda announced electric vehicle plans in Tokyo.
Netflix, Disney+, and HBO Max are competing in Los Angeles.
